document.full_text: organ donations are fewer in south texas than in the united states as a whole, and aspects of hispanic culture are cited as a factor. a campaign is under way to change that.
document.title: the texas tribune: organ donations lag in south texas, and culture is a factor
lines_and_colors: organ donations are fewer in south texas than in the united states as a whole, and aspects of hispanic culture are cited as a factor. a campaign is under way to change that.
